argument.name: element
argument.description: A pointer to a DOM element or the ID of an element.

property.name: type
property.description: Animation type. Can be one of the following properties: 'none', 'fade', 'slide', 'blind', 'clip', 'drop', 'explode', 'fold', 'puff', 'scale', 'size', or 'pulsate'.

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration of the animation in milliseconds.

property.name: onComplete
property.description: Function to call when the show is complete.

page.description: Show an element that is hidden.
page.discussion: Animation can be specified by passing in animation settings. Animation uses jQuery, if the jQuery library is not available, a plain show will be done.
